oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Military Orders, Sewanee Branch Intercollegiate Intelligence Bureau
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Military order from members of the University of the South Advisory Committee to the Sewanee Branch Intercollegiate Intelligence Bureau dated May 31, 1917. The order detailed how one unit of thirty-six men needed to be raised from the University of the South for the War effort. The order read: "These men will become members of the Medical Enlisted Reserve Corps under the National Defense Act of June 3, 1916, and after enlistment they will be under Government orders." Numbers have been written in pencil on both sides.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Robert Frank Hodge World War I Papers, 1914-1919
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: American Field Service; World War, 1914-1918
Orders (military records)
